meta.title: Pablo Rueda - Frontend developer
meta.description: Front-end developer in Spain. Open for new projects, collaborations or freelance projects.
meta.author: Pablo Rueda

about.title: ROAD TO FRONT END
about.text: I started my career with data and statistics, but while I was discovering the advantages of a nice visualization I discovered the front end field and got in love with it. One day, I decided that it was time to use my skills in this amazing field.

clientsite.description: Responsive client website created with Gatsby / React.

gameoflife.description: Conway's game of life created using React.

corona.description: Responsive Corona Virus web app created (with React) to track the spread of the pandemy around the world.

portfolio.description: My personal responsive portfolio, created using Gatsby / React.

fitness.description: Actually, this was my first React App. I created it to optmize my time doing sport.

pacman.description: As soon as I knew the basics of Object Oriented Programming with ES6 JS, I wanted to create my own mini-game. This is the result.

appleclon.description: Responsive Apple Clone (UK Nov. 2020) created with HTML, CSS, SASS and Javascript.
